title: Ep0.4 - Uniting Mississippi-PILOT
description: This episode considers what philosophy has to say about leadership. It features a recorded presentation I gave at the Center for the Study of Southern Culture on my September 2015 book, 'Uniting Mississippi: Democracy and Leadership in the South.' Though Mississippi is the focus of my application, the principles and challenges apply through the South and beyond.
